attributes.title: Trump has a tiny pp
attributes.review: i heard that trump said the n-word to obama and tried to touch his butthole so obama went on tik-tok and put paint on his hand just like this 🤚🏾🎨🙍🏾🎨🖐🏾 with music like this “ i tried to scream but my head head was under water” and he has a micro pp. (and scene)

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Worst app ever it takes forever to load!! It is so glitchy! And like once I got on yall had the audacity to put a weird looking Cheeto on the main page that it scared me so much! When I tell you I ran to my mom!!! Omg! Worst app!!!! 🤮

attributes.title: I hate this app 🤢
attributes.review: Literally opened the app to be greeted by a misogynistic, homophobic, and Racist Cheeto dusted man . Like any normal person would I immediately closed the app to prevent future Trauma , but then I can not stop seeing that image in my nightmares .... someone remove plz 😖😖🤮🤮

attributes.title: DISGUSTING TH
attributes.review: Idk who told this orange Cheeto looking man to get an app. He deserves the hate. I don’t like him he is a racist pig. This app deserves to be deleted. Don’t nobody wanna dowload an app that he has. We don’t care about him. He a is a bad person & i do not wanna see a dang on Cheeto have an app it’s weird.

attributes.title: UGH WHY!
attributes.userName: i want tik tok to stay
attributes.review: This app is horrible.i went to sign up and I hit the button and it sent e to this sketchy website. I don’t know if who ever made this did the on purpose but I would not buy it. Don’t get the app!!!!

attributes.title: Ewww he looks like a crusty musty Cheeto
attributes.review: I saw this app and downloaded to bust a nut but then. I saw some ugly wrinkly Cheeto. I immediately decided to close the app and delete it but eventually it caused me to throw up and make my pp fall out. Absolutely horrible app and the guy looks like a pedo 🍆🍆🍆

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I would show this app and the people that run it to my worst enemy i think i might have ptsd from this. I’m not sure if i can overcome what i have been exposed to. I will be sending my medical bills

attributes.title: donald trump...why.
attributes.review: honestly, this app doesn’t deserve to grace the apple store with its horrendous presence. i opened to see a picture of a man, who shall not be named doing the chicken dance. i was horrified and will be forever traumatized by that experience. the app not only is a huge disappointment to us democrats but as young black teen in america, i am horrified by the fascist and racist ways of this app. i don’t like you donald trump and i hope you and your spray have fun rotting in hell.

attributes.title: Horrible 😾🤢🤮
attributes.review: First off this is the WORST app I have had and that’s saying a lot considering how many terrible apps I’ve downloaded, it’s laggy and glitchy and has soooo many bugs. Mr. Cheeto I’m so sorry but this app is just not it 😾😾

attributes.title: awful app
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to educate myself about my amazing racist sexist misogynistic homophobic president and as soon as i opened it my phone started glitching and from that point on all i could see was an orange man on my screen.. i had to get a new phone. my phone also overheated so much it almost burnt me. as soon as i opened it, i felt sick to my stomach and i don’t think it was a coincidence. take this off the app store.
